name: 陳協慶
objective:
本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等實做與統計工具使用。
The purpose of this course is to train students to familiarize themselves with the statistical methods and theories that are often used. They can use collected data to  analyze unknown phenomena and lay the foundation for other related disciplines. Course content includes: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, analysis of variance and statistical tool use.
schedule:
(wk1) Monte Carlo simulation using Excel
(wk2) 1.Calculate sample statistic, 2.Do random sampling, 3.Hands on sample statistic distribution. (HW#1)
(wk3) Sample distribution exercise
(wk4) Confidence interval & bootstrap C.I. estimation (HW#2)
(wk5) C.I. for other statistics (Bootstrap) 
(wk6,7) Hypotheses test with Excel (CH10+ Bootstrap)
(wk8) Hypotheses test (CH11+Bootstrap) (HW#3)
(wk9) 期中考
(wk10) Permutation test (Exact test)
(wk11,12) Chi-square tests, Fisher’s exact test & Maximum likelihood estimation
(wk13) ANOVA using Excel (Quiz)
(wk14,15) Linear regression using Excel & XLSTAT (HW#4)
(wk16,17) Linear/Multiple regression using Excel & XLSTAT 
(wk18) 期末考
materials: Statistics for Business & Economics, by Anderson, et al.
